a.span: Fairport Harbor Exempted Village School District

div.p: With the entire state of Ohio, under a stay-at-home order to prevent the spread of COVID-19, Ohio Gov. Mike DeWine ordered public playgrounds to close to limit the spread of coronavirus. We have made the decision to close the playground at McKinley Elementary until further notice to reinforce social distancing and prevent further spread of the virus.
We encourage our students and families to engage in other outdoor activities, run, bike, hike while still adhering to the social distancing recommendations.
Thank you for your support and cooperation as we continue to adjust to the ever-evolving health situation in our communities.
